rows.label: xs01080100_MSG0001
rows.name: So this street's what we call Armory Alley.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01080100_MSG0002
rows.name:
BLADEs can requisition equipment
from any of the vendors here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01080100_MSG0003
rows.name:
I won't lie—most BLADE members
face danger on a daily basis.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01080100_MSG0004
rows.name:
Having the latest gear isn't about impressing your friends—
it's a matter of survival.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01080100_MSG0006
rows.name:
And that goes not only for your personal armor
and weapons—what we call ground gear—[ST:page p1=150 ]but for Skell equipment as well.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01080100_MSG0007
rows.name:
You can even buy whole Skells!
Can you imagine owning your own Skell?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01080100_MSG0009
rows.name: I think all that's left is the heart of BLADE itself—BLADE Tower.[ST:wait ]
